activity.title: ohcnetwork/design#27
activity.text:
**Design Work Blocked - Awaiting Product Clarity on Valuesets**

The core reasons for this block are:

- Valuesets are still a bit of a work in progress, so letâ€™s leave them as-is until we have a better handle on things. The server defaults are all you need for now.

Updated Figma Files: I have captured the current state of the design, including all iterations, and updated the linked Figma file. These files reflect the work done up to this point and will serve as the base when the block is lifted.
[https://www.figma.com/design/Z93EYKSa1MdBmXndsMBJSQ/Care---Master?node-id=28638-138227&t=xSaatvYuKp4EG6d9-1](url)

activity.text:
Let's ensure these layout specifications are met:

- The Search Input height should be set to 40 px.

- The container height for the "Done" action area is defined as 44 px.
